This table replaces Vehicle kilometres goods vehicles; vehicle weight and territory 2001-2017

Vehicle kilometres are used for calculating emissions. More information about calculating vehicle kilometres and emissions by mobile sources can be found in Methods for calculating the emission of transport in the Netherlands.
More information can be found in the theme 'Traffic and transport' in Dutch language or in English language (but with less detail).
It has become illegal to reverse the odometer or to advertise about that. This obligation applies to personal vehicles and light company vehicles (up to 3
column2: 500 kg). Odometer readings have to be registered more often in order to reduce the chance of fraud.
odometer readings for vehicles up to 3
column3: 500 kg are also registered by change of car ownership
